pr_title: Do not restart on changes between null and empty string

timeline.message: Do not restart on changes between null and empty string

timeline.bodyText: use coerce to string instead of casting
timeline.author: MikeDombo

timeline.bodyText: you could check that both are empty using Utils.isEmpty
timeline.author: MikeDombo

timeline.message: Using Coerce instead of a cast

timeline.bodyText: can't this all be simplified? Utils.isEmpty(oldValue) && Utils.isEmpty(newValue)
timeline.author: MikeDombo

timeline.bodyText: this is also covered by L105
timeline.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: For some reason I thought it was returning something different. Removed it.
replies.author: tomnagy-aws

timeline.author: rbattle
